channel.title: PerconaXtraDB Quickstart on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in PerconaXtraDB Quickstart on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: PerconaXtraDB Quickstart Guide
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Percona XtraDB QuickStart This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to run a PerconaXtraDB database. Note: The yaml files used in this tutorial are stored in docs/examples/percona-xtradb folder in GitHub repository kubedb/docs. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
